HostAddon is back with resourceful series of Unmanaged VPS Hosting. Are you trying to upgrade from shared hosting and looking for more control, space, ram, reliability and bandwidth within the budget of a shared hosting. Look no further, our simple, powerful VPSes are perfectly crafted for performance at fraction of the cost of a dedicated server. Our brigade of powerful 16 core XEON servers with 48 GB minimum RAM and RAID 10 protected storage, this helps us provide you with the highest performing VPSes.

Don't waste you precious time on cheap hardware and bad network, invest in high class services to get better results.
